title: {this-key} <SUB>
description: Manages the Access List for this category of commands.

type.title: type [SUB]
type.description: Shows the current type of the Access List.

set.title: set <'blacklist'|'whitelist'>
set.description:
Sets the type of the Access List.
Valid types: `blacklist`, `whitelist`.

list.title: list
list.description: Lists all Users in the Access List.

add.title: add <USER...>
add.description: Adds all the specified Users to the Access List.

remove.title: remove <USER...>
remove.description: Removes all the specified Users from the Access List.

list.title: list
list.description: Lists all Roles in the Access List.

add.title: add <ROLE...>
add.description: Adds all the specified Roles to the Access List.

remove.title: remove <ROLE...>
remove.description: Removes all the specified Roles from the Access List.
